reviewText: We bought it because we went to Ridgway, CO and did the Owl Creek Pass, many film back drops and beautiful country.

I've seen these 100s of times but when my 5 year old grandson said he wanted to watch Rooster Cogburn I knew it was time to add these 2 to the collection. Both are great western and I am raising a new generation of cowboys watching them.

This is a great movie. Very well made, well acted, and worthy of the critical acclaim it's gotten over the years. I recently watched The Searchers as well. That movie truly sucked - in SPITE of its critical acclaim - so True Grit turned out to be a true pleasant surprise! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
I had to view this for a class - not my favorite.
